post.content:
The prequel notion paid off

[Update: Koei Tecmo has reported in their most recent January 2021 earnings document (as translated by ResetEra) that Age of Calamity continues to be a success. As of January 25 of this year, the publisher reports that they’ve pushed 3.5 million copies of the game, which is still the crown jewel of the entire “Warriors/Musou” franchise.]

Anyone, somewhere, whether or no longer it is at Nintendo or Omega Power, is smiling ear to ear proper now.

Whoever’s notion it change into once to tie Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity directly into Breath of the Wild is a genius. Your total “prequel” and alternate history perspective fit very neatly with the total plucky feel of the Warriors sequence, and it appears to be like to be fancy that gambit paid off financially as neatly.

In preserving with Koei Tecmo, Age of Calamity shipped three million worldwide fashions, which to them, makes it the most efficient-promoting Warriors game of all time. This duration technically began all the tactic during the twelve months 2000, when the first objective appropriate Dynasty Warriors (Dynasty Warriors 2, a sequel to a fighter) change into once released. The publisher additionally notes that they might possibly well continue to distribute the demo for the game, whilst you had been that solution to test it out, nevertheless are scared that they’ll even pull it.

Undergo in mind the excellence between shipped and bought here. For Koei Tecmo, it is their most a success Warriors game. Nonetheless it completely stays to be considered how heaps of those fashions will likely be bought-through. As a total rule, standard mainline Dynasty Warriors titles promote roughly one million fashions worldwide in some unspecified time in the future of the lifetime of every and each game. Spinoffs can fare better: the long-established Hyrule Warriors additionally beforehand smashed Warriors records aid in 2015.

I personal it is favorable to inform that there’ll likely be one other Hyrule Warriors in some unspecified time in the future, as neatly as DLC for Age of Calamity and potentially a “Entire” model on a future Nintendo console.
